english.segment1: The mood is right, the spirit's up. We're here tonight and that's enough. Simply having a wonderful christmastime. Simply having a wonderful christmastime
english.segment2: The party's on, the feeling's here. That only comes this time of year. Simply having a wonderful christmastime. Simply having a wonderful christmastime
english.segment3: The choir of children sing their song. They practiced all year long. Ding-dong, ding-dong, ding-dong, ding. Ooh..
english.segment4: Simply having a wonderful christmastime. Simply having a wonderful christmastime
english.segment5: The word is out, about the town. Oh don't look down. Simply having a wonderful christmastime
english.segment6: The choir of children sing their song. They practiced all year long. Ding-dong, ding-dong, ding-dong, ding. Ooh..
english.segment7: The party's on, the feeling's here. That only comes this time of year. Simply having a wonderful christmastime. We're simply having a wonderful christmastime. Simply having a wonderful christmastime
english.segment8: Simply having a wonderful christmastime. A wonderful christmastime.
